channel.title: Women's Equality Party / @WEP_UK
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @WEP_UK. Generated by nitter.42l.fr

item.title: RT by @WEP_UK: New: The rising privatisation of NHS services across England “intensified” by Tory reforms in 2012 has corresponded with a “decline” in healthcare quality—and “significantly increased” rates of deaths from treatable causes, per a decade-long Oxford University study.
item.dc:creator: @andrewgregory
item.description: New: The rising privatisation of NHS services across England “intensified” by Tory reforms in 2012 has corresponded with a “decline” in healthcare quality—and “significantly increased” rates of deaths from treatable causes, per a decade-long Oxford University study.

item.title: "The topic of women’s reproductive rights are currently being bandied about in Parliament as though they’re up for debate, when they absolutely aren’t...The law must reflect that by fully decriminalising abortion access." https://inews.co.uk/news/britains-leading-abortion-clinic-law-uk-parliament-1712890
item.dc:creator: @WEP_UK
item.description:
"The topic of women’s reproductive rights are currently being bandied about in Parliament as though they’re up for debate, when they absolutely aren’t...The law must reflect that by fully decriminalising abortion access."
inews.co.uk/news/britains-le…

item.title:
RT by @WEP_UK: Also, many people don't realise that abortion isn't properly legal in England, Wales, and Scotland.
You have to get permission from two doctors, otherwise you could be prosecuted under criminal law... the maximum sentence is life imprisonment. 4/5 https://www.oxfordmail.co.uk/news/20083264.woman-24-court-accused-procuring-abortion/
item.dc:creator: @ManduReid
item.description:
Also, many people don't realise that abortion isn't properly legal in England, Wales, and Scotland.

You have to get permission from two doctors, otherwise you could be prosecuted under criminal law... the maximum sentence is life imprisonment.
4/5
oxfordmail.co.uk/news/200832…

item.title: Using what's app groups to share disgusting & offensive messages is clearly a trend in the Met, who still won't acknowledge their institutional racism or misogyny. Urgent reform is needed - you can't address a problem you refuse to recognise. https://www.theguardian.com/uk-news/2022/jun/29/met-officers-accused-of-sharing-racist-whatsapp-message-about-meghan
item.dc:creator: @WEP_UK
item.description:
Using what's app groups to share disgusting & offensive messages is clearly a trend in the Met, who still won't acknowledge their institutional racism or misogyny. Urgent reform is needed - you can't address a problem you refuse to recognise.
theguardian.com/uk-news/2022…

item.title: Abortion still exists in our criminal code - and these are the consequences for women in England and Wales. https://www.nationalworld.com/news/crime/abortion-uk-police-investigate-women-illegal-abortions-england-wales-us-states-bans-3749526
item.dc:creator: @WEP_UK
item.description:
Abortion still exists in our criminal code - and these are the consequences for women in England and Wales.
nationalworld.com/news/crime…

item.title: RT by @WEP_UK: “She walked everywhere. She put her party shoes in a bag and donned her trainers. She walked. Zara believed that a woman should be able to walk home…She was in the heart of her community, ten minutes from home. 'We all need to be talking about what happened to OUR ZARA”
item.dc:creator: @fatimamanji
item.description:
“She walked everywhere. She put her party shoes in a bag and donned her trainers. She walked. Zara believed that a woman should be able to walk home…She was in the heart of her community, ten minutes from home.
'We all need to be talking about what happened to OUR ZARA”

item.title: Everyone should feel supported when coming out. Check out this YouGov survey ➡️ And keep campaigning to #TakePride and root out hate.
item.dc:creator: @WEP_UK
item.description: Everyone should feel supported when coming out. Check out this YouGov survey ➡️ And keep campaigning to #TakePride and root out hate.

item.title:
RT by @WEP_UK: On Saturday I’ll be going to Zara’s vigil.
Holding space for our pain and coming together is part of what we have to do to face down the misogyny and violence that took Zara from us.
See the message below from her family and please join us if you can.
#RestInPowerZara
item.dc:creator: @ManduReid
item.description:
On Saturday I’ll be going to Zara’s vigil.

Holding space for our pain and coming together is part of what we have to do to face down the misogyny and violence that took Zara from us.

See the message below from her family and please join us if you can.

#RestInPowerZara

item.title:
RT by @WEP_UK: We must stand in resolute solidarity with our sisters and siblings in the US whilst being clear-eyed about the fragility of the rights we think we have in the UK.
In Northern Ireland, although abortion is legal... accessing it is virtually impossible. https://inews.co.uk/news/northern-ireland-abortion-advice-virtually-impossible-1697938 2/5
item.dc:creator: @ManduReid
item.description:
We must stand in resolute solidarity with our sisters and siblings in the US whilst being clear-eyed about the fragility of the rights we think we have in the UK.

In Northern Ireland, although abortion is legal... accessing it is virtually impossible.
inews.co.uk/news/northern-ir…
2/5

item.title:
This so-called 'bill of rights' is already being used by the government to pick and choose whose rights to uphold.
Don't be fooled by the name - this is a bill designed to undermine our fundamental rights.
https://www.theguardian.com/politics/2022/jun/29/dominic-raab-says-right-to-abortion-does-not-need-to-be-in-bill-of-rights
item.dc:creator: @WEP_UK
item.description:
This so-called 'bill of rights' is already being used by the government to pick and choose whose rights to uphold.

Don't be fooled by the name - this is a bill designed to undermine our fundamental rights.

theguardian.com/politics/202…

item.title:
RT by @WEP_UK: I am still reeling from Roe vs. Wade. Anticipating it didn't make it any less of a blow.
It means that across much of the US women are no longer sovereign over their own bodies, and as this clip shows similar attitudes prevail on our shores too.
We must be vigilant. 1/5
item.dc:creator: @ManduReid
item.description:
I am still reeling from Roe vs. Wade. Anticipating it didn't make it any less of a blow.

It means that across much of the US women are no longer sovereign over their own bodies, and as this clip shows similar attitudes prevail on our shores too.

We must be vigilant.
1/5

nitter.42l.fr/MirrorPolitics/status/1541778555088011264#m

item.title:
Our hearts go out to the family and friends of Zara Aleena. May she rest in power. Let’s unite to honour her life and walk her home.
Join the vigil on Saturday at 1.30pm, opposite Cranbrook Rise. Please wear white, and read the below message from her family.
item.dc:creator: @WEP_UK
item.description:
Our hearts go out to the family and friends of Zara Aleena. May she rest in power. Let’s unite to honour her life and walk her home.

Join the vigil on Saturday at 1.30pm, opposite Cranbrook Rise. Please wear white, and read the below message from her family.

item.title:
If Boris Johnson is truly concerned about toxic masculinity & not using it as a cheap jibe, then we are looking forward to his return to the UK when he can begin addressing the ways it manifests in his government & politics, the police, day to day life...
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-61976526
item.dc:creator: @WEP_UK
item.description:

item.title: RT by @WEP_UK: #Neverforgotten #ZaraAleena may you rest in peace and power! You are truly loved ❤️A Vigil this Sat 2nd July. "The tragic, brutal, inhuman death of Zara Natasha Aleena has no place in this society..Help us to walk her home..." Pls read full message from her family. #WhyWeRise
item.dc:creator: @MillionWomen
item.description:

item.title:

item.title:
#PrimadonnaFest2022 is back and WE want YOU to join us! One of our members will win two tickets to spend the weekend enjoying thought-provoking discussion, music, literature, creative workshops and much more! @PrimadonnaFest
To enter, join the party: https://www.womensequality.org.uk/membership_start

item.title: Protest should be our fundamental human right… except oh wait, they want to get rid of that too. This is NOT a violent protest. This is democracy under threat from a government leaning towards authoritarian leadership.
item.dc:creator: @WEP_UK
item.description:
Protest should be our fundamental human right… except oh wait, they want to get rid of that too. This is NOT a violent protest. This is democracy under threat from a government leaning towards authoritarian leadership.
